title: About the League of Legends Gundam Sets Idea for the Merchandise Store...
body:
I bought this guy (Exia Dark Matter) since I thought he looked like 'in ult' Mecha Aatrox (the redness and wings) and since he had a sword...

Well, I dunno...
I tried to put him in an Aatrox idle pose...whaddya guys think?
I think League of Legends Gundam sets would still have a huge market...since normal Gundam can be this close

replies.body: Apart from colour, that is pretty damn close to Mecha Aatrox.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=e7dkIFlE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-01T02:44:24.128+0000)
>
> Apart from colour, that is pretty damn close to Mecha Aatrox.

If I took a 3D thing of it you'll see it's only so close, but not that close :P
